actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Ship Mortgage Act, 1920, in order to provide that a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and a territory of the United States shall be considered to be a citizen of the United States for the purposes of such Act.

summary.text: Provides that a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and a territory of the United States shall be considered to be a citizen of the United States for the purposes of the Ship Mortgage Act. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 922(a)(5))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Ship Mortgage Act, 1920, in order to provide that a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and a territory of the United States shall be considered to be a citizen of the United States for the purposes of such Act.
